item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography I am a Research Assistant at the University of Barcelona (Spain). I received the BSc degree in telecommunication engineering from Telecom SudParis in 2011, and the MSc degree in Computer vision from Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona (UAB). I am currently working toward the PhD degree (expected, 2019) at the Universitat de Barcelona. I am a fellow of the Computer Vision Center, UAB. My main research interests include deep learning, face and behavior analysis, affective computing, social signal processing, and human-computer interaction.

item.title: Recent Publications
